author: boudoul
body:
This Pull Request is setting up the geometry intended to be used for the TDR Namely Tilted Tracker + Pixel 4021
This is a rebase of #15662 

Details of this geometry were presented in UPS : https://indico.cern.ch/event/563122/contributions/2275415/attachments/1324245/1987214/trackerSim_160817.pdf

Some notes (@kpedro88 , @delaere )

```
I created a D4 scenario which is a clone of D3, but with the new Tracker (T3)
The Numbering in the Pixel disks is fixed thanks to @atricomi
```

   The phase1 disc Builder used so far is now separated (due to change fro phase1 geometry - Thanks @schneiml )

```
The Digitizer algorithm can recognize the simhits depending on the location with Tracker (Pixel /Outer Tracker PS etc.. ) @suchandradutta
I have added the WF number 210XX to be tested in IB - This should be uptodate with respect to any revolutions made these days by @kpedro88 and @lgray 
```

Would be great to have it in pre 12 ( I tried as much as I can to solve merge - conflicts between any other workflows developments  phase1 pixel geometry impacting this... all were in the queue at the same time  for pre12 ..) 

Subsequent PR (most likely then for Pre13) will adress reco wfs (so far up to local reco) and possible impact of changing phase1 pixel geometry
title: Phase2 Tracker Tilted + V4021 Pixels : Geometry and WFs up to Local Reco - Rebase
